Chordate:


He thought for a moment.  Smokescreen had reported that they were in the 
process of apprehending the intruder, and that its cloaking device was 
inoperable.  It wouldn't hurt for him to leave his post, again.  He could 
have someone else take his place at the bridge.

"Well, Feline, actually, I'd hate to leave you lost again by saying no.  So, 
if you want to wait a cycle," he smiled, "I can have someone come up and take 
my place, and we can go for that walk."
